title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When inputting 'new Date()' as content for three items and saving and previewing the application, the datetime values are displayed differently in the dynamic text item compared to the data and text item.
EB: The datetime values should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data and text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Input 'new Date()' as the content for three items.
2. Save and preview the application.
3. Observe the displayed datetime values in the dynamic text item and the data and text item.
